member.summary: Release resources used by the control.

member.summary: Draws the outer border for the control using the ButtonColor property.
member.param: The graphics object used in the paint event.

member.name: M:EDPComponent.VistaButton.DrawInnerStroke(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draws the inner border for the control using the HighlightColor property.
member.param: The graphics object used in the paint event.

member.summary: Draws the background for the control using the background image and the BaseColor.
member.param: The graphics object used in the paint event.

member.name: M:EDPComponent.VistaButton.DrawHighlight(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draws the Highlight over the top of the control using the HightlightColor.
member.param: The graphics object used in the paint event.

member.name: M:EDPComponent.VistaButton.DrawGlow(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draws the glow for the button when the mouse is inside the client area using the GlowColor property.
member.param: The graphics object used in the paint event.

member.name: M:EDPComponent.VistaButton.DrawText(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draws the text for the button.
member.param: The graphics object used in the paint event.

member.name: M:EDPComponent.VistaButton.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draws the image for the button
member.param: The graphics object used in the paint event.

member.name: P:EDPComponent.VistaButton.ButtonText
member.summary: The text that is displayed on the button.

member.name: P:EDPComponent.VistaButton.ForeColor
member.summary: The color with which the text is drawn.

member.name: P:EDPComponent.VistaButton.TextAlign
member.summary: The alignment of the button text that is displayed on the control.

member.name: P:EDPComponent.VistaButton.Image
member.summary: The image displayed on the button that is used to help the user identify it's function if the text is ambiguous.

member.name: P:EDPComponent.VistaButton.ImageAlign
member.summary: The alignment of the image in relation to the button.

member.name: P:EDPComponent.VistaButton.ImageSize
member.summary: The size of the image to be displayed on the button. This property defaults to 24x24.

member.name: P:EDPComponent.VistaButton.ButtonStyle
member.summary: Sets whether the button background is drawn while the mouse is outside of the client area.

member.name: P:EDPComponent.VistaButton.CornerRadius
member.summary: The radius for the button corners. The greater this value is, the more 'smooth' the corners are. This property should not be greater than half of the controls height.

member.name: P:EDPComponent.VistaButton.HighlightColor
member.summary: The colour of the highlight on the top of the button.

member.name: P:EDPComponent.VistaButton.ButtonColor
member.summary: The bottom color of the button that will be drawn over the base color.

member.name: P:EDPComponent.VistaButton.GlowColor
member.summary: The colour that the button glows when the mouse is inside the client area.

member.name: P:EDPComponent.VistaButton.BackImage
member.summary: The background image for the button, this image is drawn over the base color of the button.

member.name: P:EDPComponent.VistaButton.BaseColor
member.summary: The backing color that the rest of the button is drawn. For a glassier effect set this property to Transparent.

member.name: T:EDPComponent.VistaButton.State
member.summary: A private enumeration that determines the mouse state in relation to the current instance of the control.

member.name: T:EDPComponent.VistaButton.Style
member.summary: A public enumeration that determines whether the button background is painted when the mouse is not inside the ClientArea.

member.name: F:EDPComponent.VistaButton.Style.Default
member.summary: Draw the button as normal

member.name: F:EDPComponent.VistaButton.Style.Flat
member.summary: Only draw the background on mouse over.
